20101213142717.250|20101213142718.500|CCO|   AN IRREGULAR HEARTBEAT,

20101213145839.889|20101213145841.000|CCO|     STELARA HELPS CONTROL
20101213145841.000|20101213145842.250|CCO|       MODERATE OR SEVERE
20101213145842.250|20101213145843.500|CCO|        PLAQUE PSORIASIS
20101213145843.500|20101213145844.750|CCO|      WITH 4 DOSES A YEAR,
20101213145844.750|20101213145846.000|CCO|     AFTER 2 STARTER DOSES.
20101213145846.000|20101213145847.250|CCO|      IN A MEDICAL STUDY,
20101213145847.250|20101213145848.500|CCO| 7 OUT OF 10 STELARA PATIENTS
20101213145848.500|20101213145849.750|CCO| SAW AT LEAST 75% CLEARER SKIN
20101213145849.750|20101213145851.000|CCO|          AT 12 WEEKS.
20101213145851.000|20101213145852.667|CCO|  AND 6 OUT OF 10 PATIENTS HAD
20101213145852.667|20101213145854.333|CCO|  THEIR PLAQUE PSORIASIS RATED
20101213145854.333|20101213145856.000|CCO|     AS CLEARED OR MINIMAL
20101213145856.000|20101213145857.667|CCO|          AT 12 WEEKS.
20101213145857.667|20101213145859.333|CCO|STELARA MAY LOWER YOUR ABILITY
20101213145859.333|20101213145901.000|CCO|      TO FIGHT INFECTIONS
20101213145901.000|20101213145902.111|CCO|          AND INCREASE
20101213145902.111|20101213145903.222|CCO|    YOUR RISK OF INFECTIONS.
20101213145903.222|20101213145904.333|CCO|    SOME SERIOUS INFECTIONS

20101213145907.667|20101213145908.778|CCO|       FOR TUBERCULOSIS.
20101213145908.778|20101213145909.889|CCO|     STELARA MAY INCREASE
20101213145909.889|20101213145911.000|CCO|     YOUR RISK OF CANCER.
20101213145911.000|20101213145912.429|CCO|   ALWAYS TELL YOUR DOCTOR IF
20101213145912.429|20101213145913.857|CCO|YOU HAVE ANY SIGN OF INFECTION,
20101213145913.857|20101213145915.286|CCO|      OR HAVE HAD CANCER.
20101213145915.286|20101213145916.714|CCO|       ALERT YOUR DOCTOR
